```{r}
stenopool_insulin_merge <- stenopool_insulin |> 
  select(
    -date,
    -min
  ) |> 
  mutate(
    hour = as.factor(hour)
  )
g7_73_merge <- g7_73 |> 
  select(
    -date,
    -min
  ) |> 
  mutate(
    hour = as.factor(hour)
  )
bt_73_merge <- bt_73 |> 
  select(
    -date,
    -min
  ) |> 
  mutate(
    hour = as.factor(hour)
  )

full <- g7_73_merge |> 
  full_join(stenopool_insulin_merge) |> 
  full_join(bt_73_merge)
```
